documents.document: @philquin Keep them coming Quinny
John Hurt you always grabbed me by the throat and the heart. You stand with the truly great.Farewell.
I'm reading a poem a day to keep Trump at bay.
The world's axis rattles from left to right as millions shake their heads watching Trump's press conference. Obama to Bozo. Heartbreaking.
Trump's inauguration will have 'soft sensuality'. Sick in my mouth.
Meryl Streep. Oh my goodness. Very single word landed.
Patrick Gower YOU are 'political chaos'. Get a grip man.
#JohnKey you were that slightly daggy uncle who told it to us straight when the other adults were pissing about with platitudes. Thank you.
@philquin yeah dump the vego gastric band. Bike and Kai Moana!
#onesmart the complete PITS! Can't activate card. Waited on phone for 53mins only to be disconnected. Get your act together!!
Trump headlines become more surreal, more frightening by the day.
Let us fervently hope Trump is another politician who reneges on his promises.
Last para spot on. Donald Trump's lying far more sinister than distortion of facts https://t.co/KfNVYrnhGu via @theage
Well played Ireland. Thoroughly deserved. If it had to be someone glad it was you.
'Amidst the rubble of the collapsing state', this. This premise I deeply believe in.https://t.co/GlqkfAVogf
@philquin That one's going straight to the pool room.
Hilary was magnificent. Utterly. Trump dangerous and unhinged. Utterly.
Dan Carter is a complete babe. That's all I've got to say.
Great stat: 20 players have scored tries in the All Black's nine internationals this year.
“Jessica Valenti: ‘People will say that Trump won simply because he didn’t spontaneously combust on stage’” https://t.co/bsC4Ubc1vK
Is the bar really that low that some commentators are saying Trump did 'well' ??
Over and out Trump.
What on earth is Trump doing stalking Hillary around the stage?
This is beginning to feel increasingly ugly https://t.co/G3eNMU5qK3
'Athleisure'- who knew this was a 'thing' let alone an entire industry?An oxymoron only the fashionistas could mangle together.
Just when you think Trump couldn't cock it up any more. Jawdroppingly atrocious.https://t.co/dItovWjSAs
@philquin @SnakeMcHardy @NickSpeak13 @johnpagani bit of early slap n tickle then black by 22
Look in the mirror Wallabies Argentina is tapping you on the shoulder. Respect Pumas.
Elated. Exhausted. What a first half #AllBlacks .
I have just eaten the perfect fried egg. Just, just so on just, just crisp bread. If that is all I achieve today I will have done enough.
'The Deserter'. Tears. https://t.co/2fkZP4CxKo
“What will survive of us is love.” Philip Larkin. Happy Poetry Day
Funny with a knife in the guts https://t.co/YNi95ABDHh
Watching MastermindNZ. Yuk. Imagine discovering you're only average undies not smarty pants
America never tasted so good as at @hillside_nz last night. Utterly foodlicious.
Gobsmacked at the leave predictions.

Have struggled with ideal drink between negroni and wine. Found it. Manzanilla sherry. Thank you.
Andrew Little you despicable xenophobe

Right decision John Key. Suck the vitriol out of the day - in fact rename it and be done.

@philquin now you know this not to be true
Anyone ever punched their dental hygienist??

We all stand with France.

Has anyone else noticed Colin Slade's vampire tooth? All of a sudden I find him sooo much more interesting.

Day two with my mother. If I have to listen to any more talk back radio I will do something violent.

#JohnCampbell class, integrity, humour and heart to the end. Thank you. Come back.
